label: AB3_tI32_121_f_g2i-001
title: $\alpha$-V$_{3}$S Structure
comments:
$\alpha$-V$_{3}$S is stable above 950$^{\circ}$C, but metastable at 25$^{\circ}$C, where this data was taken. 
 Below 825$^{\circ}$C the system transforms to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_tP32_133_h_i2j-001}{$\beta$-V$_{3}$S structure}. 
 We have shifted the origin by 1/2 c $\hat{z}$ from that used by (Pedersen, 1959).
